ti:edition.ti:label: Remedy of Love
ti:edition.ti:description: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D, creator; Ehwald, Rudolf, 1847-1927, editor; Merkel, Rudolf, 1811-1885, editor

ti:translation.ti:label: Remedia Amoris, The Art of Love in Three Books The remedy of love. The art of beauty. The court of love. The history of love amours.
ti:translation.ti:description: Ovid, 43 B.C.-17 or 18 A.D, creator; Tate, Nahum, 1652-1715, translator; , editor
